caption.center: Ex Parte Ezzle MORRIS et al.

opinion.posture: Petition for writ of prohibition to J. S. Williams, as Judge, Circuit Court, BarbourPage 699 County, and Ben Baker, as Register of said court.
opinion.attorneys: James J. Winn, of Clayton, for petitioners.
opinion.opinion_text:
Rule nisi denied.
GARDNER, C. J., and FOSTER, LIVINGSTON, and STAKELY, JJ., concur.
